hero.headline: End of missed opportunities
hero.subline: Phone rings. Kleedo answers, schedules and sends confirmations. You negotiate, work and nothing pulls you away from the desk.

painPoint.headline: Every unanswered call hurts the wallet
painPoint.description: Either you interrupt the meeting or you lose a lead. Bad choice in both cases ‚Äî and it repeats all day.
points: Interruption in the middle of a meeting = angry clients
Stress and chaos instead of peace to work

solution.headline: AI receptionist that holds the line and nerves
solution.description: Kleedo answers in seconds, asks questions, suggests appointments, writes to calendar and sends confirmations. You maintain your flow.

cards.title: More clients
cards.description: 1‚Äì2 new leads per week often mean monthly difference. Kleedo won't let any fall under the table.

cards.title: Fewer interruptions
cards.description: You don't chase phones. Meetings run smoothly and professionally.

cards.title: Always available
cards.description: In Czech and English, even outside business hours ‚Äî according to rules you set.

cards.title: Smart reminders
cards.description: SMS/WhatsApp reminders reduce no-shows and save time and nerves.

cards.title: No barriers
cards.description: Foreign caller? Assistant switches to English and arranges everything just as smoothly.

cards.title: Scales with you
cards.description: Handles multiple lines simultaneously and transfers according to your rules.

cards.quote: Phone no longer controls us. Clients get through immediately and I finish the meeting in peace.
cards.author: Auto service owner

cards.quote: Outside business hours we have peace and yet miss nothing. Times we offer, I have full control over.
cards.author: Fitness center owner

cards.quote: English without problems. Foreigners book with us just as easily as Czechs.
cards.author: Cosmetic studio owner

items.question: How does AI know what to offer?
items.answer: In administration you set services, prices, durations and business hours. Kleedo follows this and keeps offers within your rules.

items.question: Can it change and cancel meetings?
items.answer: Yes. Reschedules, cancellations and confirmations it handles itself and writes everything directly to your calendar.

items.question: Can I customize communication style?
items.answer: Absolutely. Tone, phrases and vocabulary you set so it matches your brand.

items.question: What if it's not sure?
items.answer: It would rather ask. And when needed, it transfers the call to a human.

items.question: How much does it cost?
items.answer: Prices are indicative and tuned during pilot. Basic from 990 CZK/month. For businesses we recommend Pro plan (2,490 CZK) with everything you'll need.

items.question: Where can I learn more about data protection?
items.answer: Details can be found in our Privacy Policy.

cta.preheadline: Pilot operation running. Spots filling quickly.
cta.headline: Stop answering everything. Start answering results.
cta.description: Pilot operation is running with limited capacity. Join before it fills up.

hero.headline: No running away from the cut
hero.subline: Kleedo answers the phone, schedules appointments and sends confirmations. You create beauty, not administration.

painPoint.headline: Missed call = missed client
painPoint.description: When you answer during coloring, work stops. When you don't answer, client goes elsewhere. Vicious circle every day.

solution.headline: AI receptionist that doesn't run for rubber bands
solution.description: Offers appointments, writes them down, reminds. And you calmly devote yourself to clients.
points: No running away from the chair

cards.title: More clients
cards.description: 1‚Äì2 new bookings per week often mean monthly difference. Kleedo won't let any slip away.

cards.title: Less chaos
cards.description: No phone chasing during work. Salon runs in peace.

cards.title: Availability by plan
cards.description: You can serve even outside business hours ‚Äî but only in windows you allow.

cards.title: Smart reminders
cards.description: Automatic reminders reduce no-shows and ensure punctuality.

cards.title: Czech and English
cards.description: Foreigners call without barriers, triage happens understandably.

cards.title: Multiple lines
cards.description: Handles multiple calls at once according to your settings. You can set rules for transfers.

cards.quote: Clients get through immediately. We have peace for work and less routine calling.
cards.author: Private salon

cards.quote: I set rules and only watch exceptions. Everything else runs by itself.
cards.author: Practical hairdresser

cards.quote: English-speaking clients book without assistance. It saves time for the assistant.
cards.author: Salon owner

items.question: Can AI make mistakes in booking?
items.answer: It's designed as a professional receptionist. Works with your calendar and follows rules you set. When not sure, it asks or transfers the call.

items.question: Does it recognize different client requests?
items.answer: Yes. Service types, triage, notes about pain ‚Äî everything can be set so offers make sense.

items.question: How much does it cost?
items.answer: Prices are indicative and tuned during pilot. Basic from 990 CZK/month. For salons we recommend Pro plan (2,490 CZK).

items.question: How about data protection?
items.answer: Data is encrypted, stored in EU and GDPR compliant. You have full control over your data. We never share it with third parties.

items.question: Can I adjust communication style?
items.answer: Yes. Tone and used phrases you adapt to salon brand.

items.question: Where can I learn more about data protection?
items.answer: Details can be found in our Privacy Policy.
